revision.text:
{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ZyXEL |model=NBG6617 |revision=(EU0101F) |asin=B01LWXIXUW;US;,B01M1BZ7FY;GB;, |series=AC1300 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf= |manuf_model= |manuf_rev= |availability=now |type=wireless router |fcc_date=07/27/2016 |fcc_id=I88NBG6617 |ic_id=2468C-NBG6617 |pcb_id= |pwr_v=12 |pwr_amp=2 |pwr_conn=barrel |cpu1_brand=Qualcomm |cpu1_model=IPQ4018 |cpu1_cspeed=638 |cpu1_cores=4 |fla1=32 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L25635F |ram1=256 |ram1_brand=Nanya |ram1_model=NT5CC128M16IP-DI |expansion_if_types=USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=1 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, internal,, TTL 3.3V,, (115200,8,N,1),, |wi1_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi1_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Qualcomm |wi2_chip1_model=IPQ4018 |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |sw_brand=Qualcomm Atheros |sw_model=QCA8075 |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=4 |wan_speed=1GbE |wan_ports=1 |addl_chips= |flags=Wave2, MU-MIMO, |stock_boot=U-Boot |stock_os=Linux |tp_firmware=LEDE Project, OpenWrt, |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user= |default_pass=1234 |oui= |oui_eth= }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2-stream 802.11ac device (433Mbps per stream), :• '''400''' Mbps - max. PHY rate for the 40MHz wide 2.4GHz channel = '''''1300 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|AC1300 MU-MIMO Dual-Band Wireless Gigabit Router}} :[http://www.zyxel.com/products_services/nbg6617.shtml Product page] :Default settings in this entry are per the [https://fccid.io/document.php?id=3077986 FCC label]. *[http://routerchart.com/zyxel/zyxel-ac1300-nbg6617-nbg6617-116 ''ZyXEL AC1300 NBG6617 (2016)'' on '''RouterChart'''] :CPU: Quad-Core @600MHz, 256MB RAM, 16MB Flash :WLAN: AC1300 802.11abgn/ac (400+867 Mbps) ===Specifications=== *CPU: 600MHz Quad-Core Processor, RAM: 256MB, FLA: 32MB *Wireless Standard: 802.11bgn (2.4GHz), 802.11an/ac (5GHz) *Wireless Speed: 400 Mbps for 2.4GHz, 867 Mbps for 5GHz *WLAN Features: Wave2, MU-MIMO, Guest Wi-Fi, WPS, WMM *Wireless Security: WPA/WPA2, WPA-PSK/WPA2-PSK *Antenna: 2x 7dBi external antennas (RP-SMA) *Ports: 1x WAN GbE, 4x LAN GbE, 1x USB 3.0 *USB Support: Mass storage support by SMB/CIFS/FTP, Print server *Application Control: Parental control, ONE Connect, ZyXEL Photo *System Management: Online firmware upgrade, Wake on LAN, UPnP *Media Server: DLNA, WiFi Multimedia (WMM), SMB *Operation Mode: Router mode, Access point mode *Power: 12V DC, 2A; Power consumption: 20W ===Firmware=== *{{OpenWrtTechData|https://openwrt.org/toh/hwdata/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6617}}, {{OpenWrtWiki|https://openwrt.org/toh/zyxel/zyxel_nbg6617}} *[https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX ''LEDE/Openwrt for IPQ4019/IPQ4028 devices'' on '''chunkeey'''] :[https://github.com/chunkeey/LEDE-IPQ40XX/commit/229c42a91ce6661bc81f036930dde1801f959026 ipq40xx: add support for the ZyXEL NBG6617] 
SOC:    Qualcomm IPQ4018 @710MHz (QCA Dakota) WiSoC
CPU:    Quad-Core ARMv7 Cortex-A7 rev 5 (v7l) Processor
FLASH:  Macronix MX25L25635F 32MiB (NOR)
RAM:    Nanya NT5CC128M16IP-DI 256MiB (DDR3L-1600/1866 @537MHz)
ETH:    Qualcomm Atheros QCA8075 Gigabit Switch (4x LAN, 1x WAN)
USB:    1x 3.0 (via Synopsys DesignWare DWC3 controller in SoC)
WLAN1:  Qualcomm IPQ4018 2.4GHz 802.11bgn 2:2x2
WLAN2:  Qualcomm IPQ4018 5GHz 802.11an/ac 2:2x2
INPUT:  RESET Button, WiFi On/Off Button, WPS Button
LEDS:   Power, WAN, LAN 1-4, WLAN 2.4GHz, WLAN 5GHz, USB, WPS

Serial:
WARNING: The serial port needs a TTL/RS-232 3.3v level converter!
Serial setting is 115200-8-N-1. 1x4 .1" header comes pre-soldered.
Pinout: [1] +3.3V (label printed on PCB), (2) Rx, (3) GND, (4) Tx
__NOTOC__
